Title: Requires residents to maintain minimum essential coverage health insurance in the state of New York or pay a tax for failing to do so
Summary: Requires residents to maintain minimum essential coverage health insurance in the state of New York or pay a tax for failing to do so; provides that such funds be used for the NY State of Health marketplace.
LawCode: Add Art 33-C ยง1580, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to requiring persons maintain minimum essential coverage
